inclusion.criterion: preoperative pathology confirmed invasive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Core biopsy was done and revealed a 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.

inclusion.criterion: Clinical T1-3 N0-3 M0 (with positive fine-needle aspiration result in their clinical or ultrasonic suspicious axillary lymph node ; no clinical or radiologic evidence of distant metastases)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Core biopsy was done and revealed a 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.

inclusion.criterion: Be able and willing to sign informed consent forms
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with enlarged internal mammary nodes by imaging
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received neoadjuvant therapy (including neoadjuvant chemotherapy and / or endocrine therapy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a previous history of breast cancer (recurrence of breast cancer and contralateral breast cancer)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of other malignancies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have had previous surgery in axillary or internal mammary
exclusion.label: not_met
